title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 432.4 - Unapproved portable kerosene heaters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 432.4 - Unapproved portable kerosene heaters

State Regulations

All portable kerosene heaters other than those approved
pursuant to section
432.2
of this Part shall
conspicuously and permanently display the statement, "This heater is not
approved for residential or commercial use," as required by section
239-d
of
the Real Property Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
432.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
